yarn cache clean

Remove the shared cache files.

Usage

$> yarn cache clean

Examples

Remove all the local archives :

yarn cache clean

Remove all the archives stored in the ~/.yarn directory :

yarn cache clean --mirror

Options

Definition
 Description
--mirror Remove the global cache files instead of the local cache files
--all Remove both the global cache files and the local cache files of the current project

Details

This command will remove all the files from the cache.
